PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (NATURAL RESOURCES) which give effect to amendments to the Income Tax Act made in 2003 [Bill C-48] by replacing the resource allowance income tax deduction with a deduction for Crown royalties and mining taxes.
